pages.text:
(PRE -SALES SCRIPT)  
 
Executive:  Good Morning sir / madam  
 
This is (Uma ) from Adityaram Property, one of the leading Real Estate developer in 
South India .  We have received your enquiry for Adityaram Empire project, plot 
property in Kelambakkam, OMR  
 
 Am I speaking to Mr Customer Na me 
 
Customer:   Yes 
 
Executive:  Thanks for confirmation sir/madam  
Adityaram Empire  project is located in OMR, Kelambakkam, (Pudupakkam ) location  
 
When you are travelling from Kelambakkam to Vandalur  road, within 1.5 kms , you can 
find Rajinikanth sir farm house on your left hand side.  There you need to take left and 
in the same road within 900 mts,  you can find our project on your left.  
 
Totally Adityaram Empire  PH 2 it is 12 acres of land extent  along with 1.5 acres  open 
park with 20+ world class amenities  where we developed 268 villa plots.  
 
We have beautiful lake view villa plot in this project.  
 
Adjacent to our project, in 20 acres, fresh water pond is available where in future too 
there won’t be any water scarcity issues, now within 20ft, sweet ground water is 
available . Also ventilation and air circulation will be in higher end.  
 
Minimum plot area starts from 6 71 sq.ft. to 3777  sq.ft with price starting from 42 
Lakhs  
 
Executive:  Can I know your actual requirement sir - Budget & size?  
 
Customer:  60 L budget  
 
Executive:  Great sir, you can able to get plots within your desired budget.

Can you visit our project by today along with your family?  
 
Customer: If, No…………  
 
Executive:  Why don’t you try to visit by tomorrow sir to grab your best plot sir.  
 
Customer:   Again If, No………  
 
Executive:   Otherwise, try to visit by this weekend (Saturday / Sunday)  
 
Customer: If, Yes……….  
 
Executive:  Can I know your alternative number and your residing location.  
 
Customer: 91XXXX777  
 
Executive:     At what time you will be reaching our project sir?  
 
Customer: Around 11 am  
 
Executive:  Fine, I am fixing your appointment with our sales manager to feel better 
experience.  
 
As there is fast moving, please bring your cheque book or Card to block your dream 
villa plot.   
 
Booking Advance amount will be One Lakh  
 
Executive:  Will share the project Detail / Location map to this WhatsApp number with 
Brochure. (Confirmation on WhatsApp Number)  
Thank you for choosing Adityaram Property .  Have a great day sir!  
 
 
Why we choose Adityaram Empire  
 
• Location ambience is very calm & peaceful.  
• We never ever face water scarcity in this location  
• Upcoming metro work has been planned from Kelambakkam to Kilambakkam

• In 2019 the price was about Rs. 2,600/ - per sq.ft and now the market price is Rs. 
6,600/ - per sq.ft..  Within 6 years, the appreciation is Rs. 5000/ - per sq.ft..   
• Now we are selling at Rs. 6000 /- per sq.ft .   Within a year period, we assure you can 
get 20% of appreciation.  
                                 
              
USP & FEATURES  
• Biggest Township  
• Fastest Developing Location in Chennai - Kelambakkam  witnesses 
rapid growth in residential sector  
• Excellent Connectivity to Navalur, Siruseri, Padur, Vandalur and 
Kelambakkam  - Kovalam, ECR  
• Upcoming Metro from Kelambakkam - Thiruporur – Mahabalipuram 
(Poonjeri)  
• Easy access to transportation hubs and its located next to 
Kelambakkam & perfect access through OMR bypass road and highway  
• Close to Top IT Hubs,  Schools, Colleges & Hospitals  
• Best -in-class Infrastructure  
• Clear Legal Documentation  
• Guaranteed High Value Appreciation  
• Ready to Construct  
• Top Grade Blacktop Internal Roads  
• Solar LED Street Lights  
• 3 years of Free Maintenance  
• Potable Sweet Ground Water in 30 ft – TDS Level – 70% to 80%  
• Avenue Trees  
• 24/7 CCTV Surveillance  
• Open Area 60%  
 
OSR AREA IN 1.5 ACRES (20+ AMENITIES)  
 
• Fitness Station  
• Kids Play Area & Leisure 
Park  
• Reflexology Pathway  
• Gazebo  
• Basketball Court  
• Pickle Ball  
• Party Lawn

• Badminton Court  
• Cricket Practice Net  
• Granite Pergola Seating 
Area  
• Flower Garden  
• Multi -Purpose Court  
• Elder Discussion Deck  
• Beneath The Branches  
• Lake View Gazebo  
• Foot Soak Pond  
• Lotus Pond  
• Lilly Pond  
• Lake View Seating Area  
• Birds Feeding Area  
• Hammock  
• Born fire Pit

data.Call Summary: Customer enquired for golden gate  agent confirmed and shared the basic project details , and location / Customer  looking for flat and plot both , customr asked to share the details she wants to check the projet details once then she  will get back to us also she is looking  for only padur , agent  pitched empire
data.AOI: To be attentive in the call , Lack of clarity while explaining the details , to more confident in the call , avoid  fillers and fumbling in the call , Need effective probing about the site visit

data.Call Summary: Customer looking plot project / Agent explained  the ecr project but customer budget 60L and looking for investment  so agent explained the empire basic details And not disclosed his sqft requirement agent shared the features and pushed for the customer for the site visit customer asked to share the details
data.AOI: Need to push the customer for the site visit more effectively  , Objection handling to be done more effectively , to be energetic and professional in the call

data.Call Summary: Customer in  omr karapakkam and she is looking 600 sqft land in omr also interested  in empire shared the basic details  about the  project and pushed for the sv customer looking for investment agent informed the features for the project and asked for Sv customer will visit the site by next week and asked to share the details
data.AOI: Should probe customer budget more effectively , Avoid filles and fumbling in the call

data.Call Summary: Customer enquired for empire agent shared the basic details about the project customer looking 1200Sqft and budget is below 50L looking for own purpose agent informed the overall budget customer asked to share the details agent informed the offers and pushed the customer for the site  visit customer wants to check the location then only she will visit
data.AOI: Whatsapp intergration to be sent not only offers project details,To be energtic and confident in the call

data.Call Summary: Customer interested in empire , Agent explained the location and shared the basic details , Customer looking  for 900sqft and the budget 40L , Agent informed  our budget to the customer and telling  offers and pushed the customer for the site visit // Customer looking for own purpose

Customer intersted in empire and looking for 600-1000Sqft agent explained the basic details about the empire , agent informed the overall budget  to the customer , and pushed the customer for the site visit ,
data.AOI: Avoid interuption in the call , Offes to be inform ,need to probe  more effectively about the customer budget

data.Call Summary: Kelambakkam - OMR  ( Empire - phase 1)Agent explained the project and pricing , Rate per sqft , plot  size  location details he  is  lookig 1200plot  SQFT  Agent  Assit  to customer  Budget 66L  customer ok with budget  he  said  he  will availabe for  Sit visit  on next  month  1  week as  of  now  He  is  out  of station
data.AOI: instant of  working  stage lead kept under RNR stage /lots of filler and fanatic error which is affecting professional in  call /  through the call there is no complete project  detail share to customer / Agent  Speck  About   Empire - phase 1  WhatsApp integration shared  for  Happinest Phase 2  project / missed follow up  /

data.Call Summary: Customer enquired for empire , agent confirmed the locaiton , and  too guide the customer for  the location clarity ,/ infomred project name and explained the basic project details , Customer looking for own purpose / budget is 50-60L  agent  pushed the cusjtomer for the site visit , today or tomorrow
data.AOI: To be confident in the call / Closing script to be followed ( Brand name to be use )

data.Call Summary: Customer interested in adityaram empire , Agent Explained the basic project details, Customer looking for own purpose , Looking 650Sqft budget is 35L Agent informed the oveall budget ,
data.AOI: To be professional in the call

data.Call Summary: Customer interested in plots and looking in  omr and ecr  Agent explained the details about the basic details abotu the nagar 5 customer budget is 50L so agent pitched empire and shared the basic details and  puhsed the custoer for the site
data.AOI: Need effective probing / SHould capture complete notes / to be professional in the call / Closing script to be follow
